response.original_title: The Monkey Who Touched the Sky: A Minecraft Film
response.overview: An experimental short documentary filmed inside Minecraft, recreating the ascent of Mount Everest from base to summit. Through a minimalist and cinematic approach, the film explores isolation, scale, and the obsession with reaching the highest point, turning a virtual world into a reflection of a real human challenge.
response.tagline: No oxygen. No sherpas. Just climbing.
response.title: The Monkey Who Touched the Sky: A Minecraft Film
